content_en: Glory be to Allah (SubhanAllah) - 33 times
O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge
So remember Me; I will remember you. (2:152)
Make a sincere prayer (du'a) for a stranger today.
All praise is due to Allah (Alhamdulillah) - 33 times

content_ar: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً
content_en: Our Lord, give us in this world [that which is] good and in the Hereafter [that which is] good.
Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease. (94:6)
Remove something harmful from the path today.
Allah is the Greatest (Allahu Akbar) - 33 times

content_ar: يَا مُقَلِّبَ الْقُلُوبِ ثَبِّتْ قَلْبِي عَلَى دِينِكَ
content_en: O Turner of the hearts, keep my heart firm upon Your religion.
And say, 'My Lord, increase me in knowledge.' (20:114)
Greet someone you don't know with 'Assalamu Alaikum' today.

content_ar: لَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ
content_en: There is no might nor power except with Allah.

content_ar: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّكَ عَفُوٌّ تُحِبُّ الْعَفْوَ فَاعْفُ عَنِّي
content_en: O Allah, You are Forgiving and love forgiveness, so forgive me.
If you are grateful, I will surely increase you [in favor]. (14:7)
Offer a glass of water to someone or fill a water bowl for animals.
I seek forgiveness from Allah (Astaghfirullah) - 100 times
My Lord, forgive me and my parents.
And take provisions, but indeed, the best provision is Taqwa. (2:197)
Give a sincere compliment to someone today.
Glory be to Allah and His is the praise - 100 times

content_ar: اللَّهُمَّ أَعِنِّي عَلَى ذِكْرِكَ وَشُكْرِكَ وَحُسْنِ عِبَادَتِكَ
content_en: O Allah, help me remember You, thank You, and worship You better.
And Allah loves the patient. (3:146)
Call or message a relative you haven't spoken to in a while.
There is no god but Allah (La ilaha illallah) - 100 times

content_ar: رَبَّنَا تَقَبَّلْ مِنَّا إِنَّكَ أَنتَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
content_en: Our Lord, accept [this] from us. Indeed You are the Hearing, the Knowing.
Indeed, Allah is with those who fear Him. (16:128)
Donate a small amount to a local food bank.
O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad - 100 times

content_ar: حَسْبِيَ اللَّهُ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ
content_en: Sufficient for me is Allah; there is no deity except Him.
Glory be to Allah, the Magnificent.

content_ar: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحُزْنِ
content_en: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from anxiety and sorrow.
And do good; indeed, Allah loves the doers of good. (2:195)
Smile at everyone you meet today as a form of charity.
O Ever-Living, O Sustainer.
My Lord, increase me in knowledge.
Say, 'Perhaps it will be soon.' (17:51)
Think of one specific blessing today and say 'Alhamdulillah' for it.
There is no deity except You; exalted are You.
O Allah, make me among those who turn to You in repentance.

content_ar: وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى اللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُ
content_en: And whoever relies upon Allah - then He is sufficient for him. (65:3)
Plant a small seed or take care of a plant today.
I am pleased with Allah as my Lord.
O Allah, make faith dear to us.
Indeed, Allah loves those who are constantly repentant. (2:222)
Be extra humble in your interactions with others today.
Sufficient for us is Allah, and [He is] the best Disposer of affairs.
O Allah, guide me to the best of manners.
And Allah knows what is in your hearts. (33:51)
Visit or call someone who is unwell to check on them.
O Owner of Majesty and Honor.
O Allah, I ask You for forgiveness and well-being.
Unquestionably, by the remembrance of Allah hearts are assured. (13:28)
Forgive someone for a small mistake they made today.
Allah is my Lord, He has no partner.
Our Lord, grant us from Yourself mercy.

content_ar: وَإِذَا سَأَلَكَ عِبَادِي عَنِّي فَإِنِّي قَرِيبٌ
content_en: And when My servants ask you concerning Me, indeed I am near. (2:186)
Avoid speaking negatively about anyone for the entire day.
Glory be to the Sovereign, the Most Holy.
O Allah, purify my heart.
Indeed, Allah loves those who rely [upon Him]. (3:159)
Help a neighbor with a task or share a small gift.

content_ar: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ الْمَلِكُ الْحَقُّ الْمُبِينُ
content_en: There is no god but Allah, the Sovereign, the Evident Truth.
O Allah, bless us in what You have provided for us.
And be patient for the decision of your Lord. (52:48)
Show extra kindness to any guest or visitor today.
Glory be to Allah, as many times as the number of His creation.
O Allah, rectify for me my religion.
And speak to people good [words]. (2:83)
Avoid any action that might annoy or harm others today.
O Lord, all praise is for You.
O Allah, benefit me with what You have taught me.
Indeed, Allah loves those who act justly. (5:42)
Teach someone something useful, however small it may be.

content_ar: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ الْعَظِيمِ
content_en: Glory be to Allah and His is the praise, Glory be to Allah the Magnificent.
O Allah, I ask You for guidance and piety.

content_ar: وَمَن يَتَّقِ اللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّهُ مَخْرَجًا
content_en: And whoever fears Allah - He will make for him a way out. (65:2)
Gather some clothes you don't need and donate them to charity.

content_ar: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ وَسَلِّمْ عَلَى نَبِيِّنَا مُحَمَّدٍ
content_en: O Allah, send blessings and peace upon our Prophet Muhammad.
Our Lord, forgive us our sins.

content_ar: إِنَّ رَحْمَتَ اللَّهِ قَرِيبٌ مِّنَ الْمُحْسِنِينَ
content_en: Indeed, the mercy of Allah is near to the doers of good. (7:56)
Try to mediate or bring peace between two people who have a conflict.

content_ar: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ
content_en: There is no god but Allah alone, He has no partner.
O Allah, I ask You for a good end.
So be patient with gracious patience. (70:5)
Do something extra kind for your parents today.

content_ar: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ وَلَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَاللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ
content_en: Glory be to Allah, praise be to Allah, there is no god but Allah, and Allah is Greatest.
O Allah, grant my soul its piety.
And Allah invites to the Home of Peace. (10:25)
Read one page of the Quran and reflect on its meaning.
I seek forgiveness from Allah the Magnificent and turn to Him.
O Allah, protect me from Your punishment.

content_ar: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ الَّذِينَ يُقَاتِلُونَ فِي سَبِيلِهِ صَفًّا
content_en: Indeed, Allah loves those who fight in His cause in a row. (61:4)
Make a special prayer for all the sick people in the world.

content_ar: لَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ الْعَلِيِّ الْعَظِيمِ
content_en: There is no might nor power except with Allah, the Most High, the Magnificent.
O Allah, make me among the patient.
But My mercy encompasses all things. (7:156)
Commit to being 100% truthful in everything you say today.
O Allah, O Most Merciful.

content_ar: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا
content_en: Our Lord, let not our hearts deviate after You have guided us.

content_ar: هل تعلم أن الصلاة هي أول ما يحاسب عليه العبد يوم القيامة؟
content_en: Did you know that Prayer is the first thing a person will be questioned about on the Day of Judgment?

content_ar: هل تعلم أن النبي محمد صلى الله عليه وسلم ولد في عام الفيل؟
content_en: Did you know that Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) was born in the Year of the Elephant?

content_ar: هل تعلم أن أطول سورة في القرآن الكريم هي سورة البقرة؟
content_en: Did you know that the longest Surah in the Quran is Surah Al-Baqarah?

content_ar: هل تعلم أن الصوم جنة، أي وقاية من النار؟
content_en: Did you know that Fasting is a shield, protecting one from the Fire?

content_ar: هل تعلم أن هناك سورة في القرآن تسمى 'عروس القرآن' وهي سورة الرحمن؟
content_en: Did you know that Surah Ar-Rahman is often called the 'Bride of the Quran'?

content_ar: هل تعلم أن أول من آمن من النساء هي السيدة خديجة بنت خويلد؟
content_en: Did you know that the first woman to embrace Islam was Khadija bint Khuwaylid?

content_ar: هل تعلم أن الزكاة هي الركن الثالث من أركان الإسلام؟
content_en: Did you know that Zakat is the third pillar of Islam?

content_ar: هل تعلم أن الحج فرض على كل مسلم مستطيع مرة واحدة في العمر؟
content_en: Did you know that Hajj is obligatory once in a lifetime for every capable Muslim?

content_ar: هل تعلم أن جبريل عليه السلام هو ملك الوحي؟
content_en: Did you know that Angel Jibreel (Gabriel) is the Angel of Revelation?

content_ar: هل تعلم أن المسجد الأقصى هو أولى القبلتين وثالث الحرمين الشريفين؟
content_en: Did you know that Al-Aqsa Mosque was the first Qibla and is the third holiest site in Islam?
